name: Propylene/ethylene copolymers (CAS Reg. No. 9010-79-1) polymerized in the presence of propylene homopolymer
FoodContactSubstance: Propylene/ethylene copolymers (CAS Reg. No. 9010-79-1) polymerized in the presence of propylene homopolymer (CAS Reg. No. 9003-07-0) complying with 21 CFR 177.1520(c) Item 1.1, to produce an inseparable blend of the two polymers.
manufacturer: The Dow Chemical CompanyBraskem S.A.,Braskem America, Inc., and  Braskem Europe
